issue.name: TComboBox.Height
issue.descr: It is impossible to set an arbitrary height to a TComboBox under Windows. Use AutoSize to make sure the size is good on all platforms.

issue.name: TButton.Color
issue.descr: It is impossible to implement without making them owner drawn.

issue.name: TBitBtn.Color
issue.short: Bitmap button color cannot be changed
issue.descr: It is impossible to implement without making them owner drawn.

issue.name: TPopupMenu.OnClose
issue.descr: If you delete the clicked menu item during OnClose the OnClick will be omitted.

issue.name: TProgressBar.Height
issue.short: Progress bar height cannot be smaller then 10 if a Windows Theme is used

issue.name: TTrayIcon.Hint
issue.short: Tray icon hint string length is limited
issue.descr: TTrayIcon.Hint may have a maximum length of 127 WideChars (will usually be more then 127 Bytes in a UTF-8 string, but may be less too, depending on the string). It's a Windows limitation, which can't be worked around.

issue.name: TPrinter.FileName
issue.short: The format of generated file is system dependant
issue.descr: The content of file created by using this property depends of the printer backend used, for example when using CUPS (mainly under Unix type systems) it will be postscript while under Windows it will be in a printer unspecified format
